name: Super Administrator
description: Users who have admin roles has all the permission access and manage the data.

name: Administrator
description: Users who can create projects and manage sub users.

name: Second Level Administrator
description: User has all access and rights as Administrator but isn't project root user.

name: Editor
description: Users who can create projects and manage it's own content or permitted content.

name: Limited
description: User who can only view or change permitted content.
